body: At the moment I am gold and I was wondering if I got emerald would it only cost $25 because I have Gold and it would be a rank upgrade because I don't really want to buy my rank like two times please tell me because there Is a coupon on and I want to buy it as soon as I can before the coupon runs out .
body_tagged: At the moment I am gold and I was wondering if I got emerald would it only cost $25 because I have Gold and it would be a rank upgrade because I don't really want to buy my rank like two times please tell me because there Is a coupon on and I want to buy it as soon as I can before the coupon runs out .
title: Rank Upgrades

replies.body:
Yes. Upgrading from Gold to Emerald costs $25.
There also is currently a 20% discount which you can use to upgrade. This brings your cost down to $20 :D
replies.body_tagged:
Yes. Upgrading from Gold to Emerald costs $25.
There also is currently a 20% discount which you can use to upgrade. This brings your cost down to $20 :D

replies.body:
what he said ^ but rank upgrades are down right now, just buy another gold rank and then contact a manager or higher on skype and give them a picture of the receipt you got purchasing the second gold so they know they have to change it to emerald
 
-IN SECOND NOTE - I am still waiting for my diamond upgrade

replies.body: Message one of the managers on skype, then when they reply, buy a second gold upgrade, and send them proof of the purchase and they will do it for you :)
